My name is Shai Geva.
I've been creating software for humans, with humans, for over 20 years.
I’m mostly a builder, but have also played more “high level roles”, like product and management.
Today I’m a tech-lead at Sayata
I write about various topics, focusing on code quality and automated tests, which are a great passion for me.
I also speak at confrences, so far exclusively about tests.
If you’d like to get notified or talk to me, please follow / ping me on twitter / x or linkedin.
